full_summary:
**T Tender Notice: Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**

=====================================

**Tender Title**
---------------

ACAN WS4511618445: Tissue Dissociator for Regulatory Research (*Instrument de dissociation tissulaire pour la recherche réglementaire*)


**Contracting Authority Name**
-----------------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)


**Tender Notice URL**
------------------------

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19477853](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19477853?extsite=MTk0Nzc4NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)


**Project Background**
----------------------

Health Canada requires a Tissue Dissociator to conduct regulatory research on vaccines against pathogens such as influenza, respiratory syncytial virus, Lyme disease and SARS-CoV-2.


**Contract Details**
---------------------

### Solicitation Number and Title

*   Solicitation Number: WS4511618445
*   Tender Title: Tissue Dissociator for Regulatory Research (Instrument de dissociation tissulaire pour la recherche réglementaire)

### Tender Closing Date and Time

*   Tender Closing Date: May 8, 2024
*   Closing Time: 2:00 PM (EDT)

### Contract Start and End Dates

*   Expected Contract Start Date: May 20, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: June 23, 2025


### Specifications and Requirements

*   The successful bidder must submit a statement of capabilities to demonstrate that their product/equipment/system meets the specifications listed in the ACAN document.


**Important Notes**
-------------------

*   All statement of capabilities must be submitted by the tender closing date and time.
*   Any statement of capabilities submitted after the tender closing date and time will not be considered responsive.
